评论概述: WAY too small.  Had to return.
评论详情: I received this item as a birthday present and had to return it.  According to the size chart, I should have had multiple inches of extra space, yet I couldn't even pull it down over my chest at all.While the tie-dye color was nice, the material left a lot to be desired as well.  It was thin, not soft, and more of a knit than a sweatshirt.Even if it had fit, I probably would have returned it.  Sadly, this did not live up to expectations at all, and I'm surprised it has so many positive reviews.
